abilities.description: Targets an enemy, slowing it for 4 seconds.
Each attack burns 40 mana from the target, and deals 1 physical damage per burned mana. Burns 8 mana per attack from melee illusions and 8 mana per attack from ranged illusions.

additionalInformation: The item's attributes grants the following additional bonuses:
120 mana, 0.5 mana regeneration and 1% flat base magic resistance.
15 and 10 main attack damage to / heroes respectively.
17.5 main attack damage to universal heroes.
name: Diffusal Blade
description: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.
trivia: The Manabreak passive used to be called Feedback and got changed at some point without notification.
Since version 7.07, Diffusal Blade no longer has a Level 2 variant.
tips: Because of the way Manabreak interacts with illusions, Diffusal Blade is most common and most effective on heroes with easy access to them, such as Phantom Lancer.
